title: NO RIVEN Q SOUND FOR BATTLE BUNNY RIVEN?!!
body: I've been playing riven for a while and suddenly one day there was no sound. This is only for the skin Battle Bunny Riven. The sound is like a cutting sound when it goes through minions or champions. There is no sound so it literally sounds like im using Q on the air ahaha. Anyone been noticing the same problem?

replies.body: yeah. she definitely needs more sexual moans.
